description.value: The magic in your blood sings an exultant song of battle. You become a master in spell attack rolls and DC. Increase the spell slots you gain from the bloodrager archetype feats by 1 for each spell rank. In addition, when you Cast a Spell from your repertoire and you are at least @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2}, double the extra damage dealt by that spell from Rage instead.
